setting.time: 1930s Moscow, night of the full moon, midnight approaching
setting.location: Moscow rooftops, high above sleeping city
setting.weather: Clear night with brilliant full moon, cool air with gentle breeze

characters.appearance: Woman, early 30s, now transformed, wild dark hair flowing, face radiant with supernatural energy
characters.clothing: Nothing but moonlight on skin, completely natural state, body glowing with ethereal light
characters.position: Flying through air above Moscow rooftops, arms extended, soaring between buildings
characters.action: Swimming through air with graceful movements, laughing with wild joy and freedom

scene.mainElements: Moscow cityscape from aerial view, red-tiled rooftops, church domes, wide boulevards below
scene.details: Moonlight reflecting off metal rooftops and window glass, chimney stacks and TV antennas silhouetted against sky, tree-lined streets visible far below, occasional lit windows in sleeping buildings, church crosses catching moonbeams
scene.background: Vast Moscow extending to horizon, river winding through city, distant lights twinkling like earthbound stars
scene.atmosphere: Complete freedom and transformation, night flight filled with ecstatic liberation, supernatural power unleashed in service of love, moonlight transforming ordinary city into magical landscape, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Aerial tracking shot following the flying figure above cityscape
composition.focus: Transformed woman's joyous expression as she soars above Moscow
composition.depth: Foreground: flying figure illuminated by moonlight; middle ground: Moscow rooftops and architecture; background: vast city extending to horizon under starlit sky

colorPalette.usageNotes: Soft, dreamy colors that blend into each other

rendering.detailLevel: selective focus, some areas sharp, others dissolving
